html:
PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2016-08162016-09-23,  ,  ECCC,  HC,  ,  , 
ActCanadian Environmental Protection Act, 1999
SubjectRegulations Amending the Prohibition of Certain Toxic Substances Regulations, 2012
PrecisRegulations Amending the PROHIBITION OF CERTAIN TOXIC SUBSTANCES REGULATIONS, 2012 in order to (1) address different issues with respect to Canada’s management of five toxic substances which are hexabromocyclododecane (HBCD), perfluorooctanoic acid, its salts, and its precursors (collectively referred to as PFOA), long-chain perfluorocarboxylic acids, their salts, and their precursors (collectively referred to as LC-PFCAs), polybrominated diphenyl ethers (PBDEs); and, perfluorooctane sulfonate (PFOS); and (2) address some administrative changes to the Regulations, some of which were requested by the Standing Joint Committee for the Scrutiny of Regulations.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2016-0252 Publication Date: 2016-10-05
AttachmentsAttachment
subject: Regulations Amending the Prohibition of Certain Toxic Substances Regulations, 2012
precis: Regulations Amending the PROHIBITION OF CERTAIN TOXIC SUBSTANCES REGULATIONS, 2012 in order to (1) address different issues with respect to Canada’s management of five toxic substances which are hexabromocyclododecane (HBCD), perfluorooctanoic acid, its salts, and its precursors (collectively referred to as PFOA), long-chain perfluorocarboxylic acids, their salts, and their precursors (collectively referred to as LC-PFCAs), polybrominated diphenyl ethers (PBDEs); and, perfluorooctane sulfonate (PFOS); and (2) address some administrative changes to the Regulations, some of which were requested by the Standing Joint Committee for the Scrutiny of Regulations.
